honors_and_awards.title: Ericsson F&F Hall Of Fame Award Q3 2013
honors_and_awards.description: A Team award by EGI India for Q3 as a recognition of 'Fast and Flawless' delivery by the E2E Team in WME program in record time with aggressive timelines and quality gates. This is part of an ambitious plan to enable Wholesale Mobile services for an Australian Telecom giant in a completely greenfield project and in-turn establish EGI's capabilities in providing E2E mobile solutions - Fast and Flawless, as they say.

honors_and_awards.title: Ericsson Rock Star Award
honors_and_awards.description: For delivering important Release with compressed deadlines, for taking full ownership of a feature in a WME Release and completing full testing with utmost discipline. As a result, the project received an overall satisfaction index of 100.0% from Client.
